body:
Tried the ice thing on page 102. 
It kinda hurt. 2 stars wouldn't recommend
I don't really care who tops who, I just like Killua x Gon yaoi. So I read it.
My horny bastard needs are ✨ satisfied✨
Finally, a top Killua doujin, I just don't see Gon being able to top Killua so seeing this is a great for me.
Ah yes more Top Killua, let's gooo
I hate the ones that killua is with his sister i'd always love killugon.

This is the most satisfying yaoi I've ever seen. I hate other hentai's 'cause they want Gon to penetrate Killua. I don't like Gon penetrating Killua it sucks as hell. I want to see more like this but I think this is the only genre that Killua penetrates
